original_title: Hello! Project 誕生15周年記念ライブ2013冬～ビバ！～
overview: Hello! Project consist of various idol girl groups, mainly produced by Tsunku. Hello! Project Tanjou 15th Anniversary was held on the 15th Anniversary of Hello! Project's formation in 2013. The concert was split into two parts, "Viva!" and "Bravo!", where this video features the "Viva!" section of the show.
title: Hello! Project Tanjou 15th Anniversary Live 2013 Fuyu: Viva!
